t: To the choirmaster: with stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the Ziphites went and told Saul, “Is not David hiding among us?”
O*pn God, save me by your name, and*ld vindicate me by your might.
O*ln God, hear my prayer; give*ld ear to the words of my mouth.
For*pn strangers have risen against me; ruthless*ld men seek my life; they*ld do not set God before themselves. Selah*ig
Behold,*pn God is my helper; the*ld Lord is the upholder of my life.
He*ln will return the evil to my enemies; in*ld your faithfulness put an end to them.
With*pn a freewill offering I will sacrifice to you; I*ld will give thanks to your name, O Lord,*s for it is good.
For*ln he has delivered me from every trouble, and*ld my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
